title: How to Kill a Regenerator in Resident Evil 4 With a Knife

steps.headline: Un-equip what you're holding to increase your running speed.
Run up to the Regenerator but keep your distance.
steps.description: Walk close then once the Regenerator does its move where it strikes with only one arm, run forward, slash its legs once then run to the other side. Repeat.

steps.headline: Repeat step 2 until one of its legs falls off.
steps.description: Start slashing it's body while it's on the floor. Hold (X) until it's dead.

text: Un-equip what you're holding to increase your running speed.  Run up to the Regenerator but keep your distance. Walk close then once the Regenerator does its move where it strikes with only one arm, run forward, slash its legs once then run to the other side. Repeat. Repeat step 2 until one of its legs falls off. Start slashing it's body while it's on the floor. Hold (X) until it's dead.
